price: 4. Ezali na molimo moko te sé azala na mokengeli likolo naye.
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
